clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Mild inflammatory uptake in cervical lymph nodes region.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Focal increased uptake in cervical lymph nodes, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
recommendations: Biopsy or follow-up imaging may be considered to confirm malignancy.
